definition: earth/dust/clay/local/indigenous/crude opium/unsophisticated/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
gold/chemical element Au/generic term for lustrous and ductile metals/money/golden/highly respected/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
category/genus (taxonomy)/family members/dependents/to belong to/subordinate to/affiliated with/be born in the year of (one of the 12 animals)/to be/to prove to be/to constitute
to join together/to fix one's attention on/to concentrate on

sentences.english: Yttrium serves as an ideal non-magnetic diluent for the rare-earth metals.
sentences.chinese: 钇被用作稀土金属一种理想的非磁性稀释剂。

sentences.english: Posibilities. for electrodeposition of rare earth metals and their alloys from aqueous solution are discussed.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了水溶液中电沉积稀土金属及其合金的可行性。

sentences.english: The determination of impurity Oxygen and Nitrogen in the metals of Neodymium and Dysprosium is studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了稀土金属钕和镝中杂质氧和氮的测定方法。

sentences.english: With scandium and yttrium, they make up the rare earth metals.
sentences.chinese: 加上钪和钇，一起组成稀土金属。

sentences.english: China controls nearly all of the rare earth metals market.
sentences.chinese: 中国几乎控制了所有的稀土金属市场。

sentences.english: Today we continue our report on the group of chemical elements known as rare earth metals.
sentences.chinese: 今天我们将继续报道稀土金属类的稀有化学元素。
